coach.name: Coach Pamela
coach.mission: I will help you achieve your potential with mindful habits

suggestions.name: Morning Meditation
suggestions.description: Start each day with 10 minutes of mindful meditation to center yourself

suggestions.name: Gratitude Practice
suggestions.description: Write down three things you're grateful for each evening

suggestions.name: Daily Movement
suggestions.description: Engage in 30 minutes of physical activity you enjoy

suggestions.name: Mindful Eating
suggestions.description: Practice eating without distractions for at least one meal daily

suggestions.name: Daily Reading
suggestions.description: Read for 20 minutes to expand your knowledge and mindset

suggestions.name: Meaningful Connection
suggestions.description: Reach out to someone you care about each day

quizTopics.title: 5 Hidden Mind-Body Disconnection Mistakes That Keep You Stuck in Physical Pain
quizTopics.description: Discover the subtle yet powerful ways you might be blocking your body's natural healing capabilities and learn how to release these patterns for greater physical freedom.
quizTopics.targetProblem: Difficulty with traditional meditation, physical tension and chronic pain
quizTopics.resultBenefit: Personalized strategies to reverse harmful patterns and reconnect with your body's wisdom

quizTopics.title: What's Your Movement Meditation Archetype?
quizTopics.description: Discover your unique mind-body connection style and how it influences your healing journey, stress response, and emotional processing.

types.name: Fluid Integrator
types.description: You naturally process emotions through flowing movements, finding peace in gentle, continuous motion.
types.strengths: Adaptability, emotional awareness, stress release through movement
types.challenges: May struggle with stillness practices, can become scattered without structure

types.name: Grounded Processor
types.description: You connect best through steady, earth-centered practices that emphasize stability and presence.
types.strengths: Consistency, physical awareness, ability to stay present in discomfort
types.challenges: May hold tension in the body, can resist necessary change and adaptation

types.name: Rhythmic Releaser
types.description: You find healing through repetitive, rhythmic movements that create a meditative state.
types.strengths: Finding flow states easily, releasing trauma through rhythm, natural consistency
types.challenges: May avoid deeper emotional processing, can become dependent on specific patterns

types.name: Intuitive Explorer
types.description: You heal through spontaneous, intuitive movements guided by inner wisdom.
types.strengths: Deep self-trust, creative problem-solving, adaptive healing approaches
types.challenges: May struggle with structured practices, inconsistency in regular practice

quizTopics.targetProblem: Difficulty finding the right mindfulness approach for your unique needs
quizTopics.resultBenefit: Personalized mindful movement practices aligned with your natural tendencies

quizTopics.title: The Mind-Body Connection Assessment: What's Your Somatic Awareness Score?
quizTopics.description: Measure your current level of mind-body integration and discover targeted practices to strengthen your somatic awareness.

scoreRanges.description: You're experiencing significant separation between mind and body, which may be contributing to physical tension and emotional stress.
scoreRanges.recommendations: Begin with simple body scan practices and gentle attention to physical sensations

scoreRanges.description: You have foundational awareness but still miss important body signals during stress or emotional challenges.
scoreRanges.recommendations: Focus on breath-body connection practices and emotional sensation mapping

scoreRanges.description: You maintain good mind-body connection in most situations but can deepen this awareness for healing.
scoreRanges.recommendations: Explore subtle energy practices and intentional movement meditation

scoreRanges.description: You have exceptional mind-body integration and can use this foundation for advanced healing practices.
scoreRanges.recommendations: Deepen your practice through teaching others and exploring nuanced somatic release techniques

quizTopics.targetProblem: Uncertainty about your current mind-body connection level and how to improve it
quizTopics.resultBenefit: A personalized roadmap to deepen your mind-body connection based on your current level

targetAudience.wants: Finding peace in movement, releasing trauma through gentle practices, achieving mind-body connection
targetAudience.frustrations: Difficulty with traditional meditation, physical tension and chronic pain, lasting effects of trauma

commonStatements: I don't have time to add another practice to my day
My schedule is already overwhelmed with self-care attempts
I can't commit to a regular practice with my busy schedule
I've tried meditation before but couldn't stick with it due to time constraints
timeBasedObjections.responseApproach: Emphasize the integration of mindful movements into existing routines rather than adding entirely new time blocks, highlight the efficiency of movement-based practices compared to traditional meditation

commonStatements: I've tried meditation before and it didn't help my trauma
Movement practices sound too simple to address my deep-rooted issues
I doubt mindfulness can really help with physical pain
This sounds like another wellness trend without substance
skepticismBasedObjections.responseApproach: Share specific case studies and testimonials from similar clients, explain the neurological basis for mindful movement, offer gentle entry points to experience benefits without full commitment

commonStatements: My body is too tense/painful for movement practices
I can't meditate because my mind is always racing
I've tried mindfulness before but I'm 'bad' at it
My trauma feels too overwhelming to address through any practice
capabilityBasedObjections.responseApproach: Emphasize the personalized, trauma-informed approach, highlight the 'no wrong way' philosophy, share Coach Pamela's personal journey through fibromyalgia and movement limitations

commonStatements: I've already invested in other healing modalities without results
I'm not sure if the investment will truly lead to lasting change
I could just follow free YouTube videos for movement practices
Why is guided mindful movement better than my current physical therapy?
valueBasedObjections.responseApproach: Articulate the unique value of personalized, trauma-informed mindful movement, highlight the efficiency of targeted practices versus generic approaches, emphasize the compounding benefits of consistent practice with proper guidance

targetAudience.dreams: Living free from physical and emotional pain, finding peace in their body, helping others heal
targetAudience.fears: Fear of confronting trauma, fear of physical movement, fear of vulnerability
targetAudience.enemies: Traditional meditation pressure, chronic stress, disconnection from body
targetAudience.copingMechanism: Avoiding movement, pushing through pain, disconnecting from body sensations
targetAudience.limitingBeliefs: My trauma is permanent, I'm not good at meditation, My body can't heal

heroJourney.startingPoint: Personal struggle with fibromyalgia and traditional meditation practices
heroJourney.challengesFaced: Physical pain, emotional trauma, inability to find peace in stillness
heroJourney.transformationProcess: Discovering the power of mindful movement, developing Mindful Motion practice
heroJourney.currentSuccessState: Thriving practice helping others heal through movement, living pain-free
heroJourney.lessonsLearned: Movement can be meditation, healing happens at your own pace, the body holds wisdom
heroJourney.whyHelpingOthers: Passionate about making mindfulness accessible through movement for those who struggle with traditional practices

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Mindful Motion transformed my relationship with meditation. As someone who couldn't sit still, finding peace through movement has been life-changing.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: After years of trauma, Pamela's somatic release approach helped me reconnect with my body in a gentle, safe way.
testimonials.result: Significant reduction in anxiety and physical tension

coachResults: Helped 100+ clients find peace through movement
Successful recovery from personal fibromyalgia journey

celebrityEndorsements.name: Dr. Sarah Miller
celebrityEndorsements.text: Pamela's approach to mindful movement is revolutionizing how we think about meditation and trauma healing.

celebrityEndorsements.name: James Thompson
celebrityEndorsements.text: The Mindful Motion technique is a breakthrough in accessible mindfulness practice.

celebrityEndorsements.name: Lisa Chen
celebrityEndorsements.text: Pamela's work bridges the gap between traditional meditation and trauma-informed movement practices.

currentLifestyleProof: Developing apprenticeship program for Mindful Motion
Creating accessible online courses for global reach

display.usage: Hero sections, major entry points, impactful headlines
